page.title: 04N.TONBRIDGE:HOBBIES & SPORT
page.content:
70% of those interviewed enjoyed gardening.8% were from group A,14% from group B,28% from group C,and 20% from group D. 44% have pets,mainly cats and dogs, with a few birds,fish and rabbits with which they spend a little time. 8% play golf,2% from group A,2% from group B,2% from group C,and 2% from group D. 8% play football,4% from group A and 4% from group B. The 6% who play cricket are all in group A.The 4% who play rugby are also in group A.The majority of those interviewed were over 40.These tended to stay at home for sport because they watch rather than participate whereas the under 40 year old people generally participate.
{* For groups see page 2.
